metadata.name: Splat by Devotion #1
metadata.description: I. SPLAT by Devotion: Why throw tomato soup on a physical Van Gogh when you can unleash it on a fine JPEG? Enter the contract address of your target NFT and Token ID to commence splat. An NFT can only be splatted once, but all NFTs can be splatted. Whether you own it -- or not. Portion of proceeds to be donated to climate change activism. !SPLAT
